reviews.review: Devs how no idea how to balance their own game, after over 5 years of developing, there is still bugs and issues that have been plaguing this game since release, and the devs are far more interested in releasing new, broken chapters that are boring as hell, to make more money before this dog shit joke of a game dies
A good game when playing with friend.

Dead by Daylight began life as a game I wasn't particularly interested in. It didn't seem all that polished, and horror has never been one of my favourite genres. But, after a while (maybe a year or so?), I got a chance to see a friend play it, and thought it looked great! So, on sale, I bought it, downloaded it, and boyo was it fun. 

The atmosphere for this game is so well-crafted, that 90% of the time you feel as if you are in a horror film, your blood pumps through your ears, your hands get all clammy as if it were you working on that generator. The community is generally great, with the occasional blip, but that's bound to happen. People state that the game is unbalanced, but I haven't managed to see a real proof of that yet.

Fan of horror? This game is for you.

Not? You might still want to give it a go.

Immernoch eines meiner liebsten Spiele und die neue Killerin trifft genau meinen Geschmack. 
Besonders positiv anzumerken ist die Community hinter diesen Spiel. Klar gibt es immer mal schwarze Schafe, aber der Gro√üteil arbeitet gut zusammen. Dadurch macht es auch als Solo Spieler spa√ü! 


Das einzige kleine Contra:  Es ist schwierig mit einem schlechten Rang Killer in eine Lobby zu kommen.

Balancing ist nicht so gut.
Einzelsurvivor haben es schwer gegen den Killer. Killer hingegen haben es schwer gegen Survivorgruppen, die sich im TS absprechen.
Aber es macht super Spa√ü mit Freunden zusammen. Auch wenn es daf√ºr keine Punkte gibt! :)
